00063 bool CBARFileWriter::CreateNewFile()
00064 {
00065         m_Version = 1.0f;
00066 
00067         // Open the file.
00068         m_strError = "";
00069         m_NewBarFile.open(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::out | std::ios::binary);
00070         if (!m_NewBarFile)
00071         {
00072                 m_strError = "Unable to open the file.";
00073                 return false;
00074         }
00075         return true;
00076 }
00077 
00079 
00080 bool CBARFileWriter::Save()
00081 {
00082         // Magic number
00083         char magic[9];
00084         snprintf(magic,sizeof(magic), "barr%c%c%c%c", '\r', '\n', '\032', '\n');
00085         WriteFixedString(m_NewBarFile, std::string(magic), 8);
00086 
00087         // Version
00088         // WriteFloat_I(m_NewBarFile, BAR_VERSION);
00089   WriteFloat_N(m_NewBarFile, BAR_VERSION);
00090 
00091         // Number of sequendes
00092         WriteInt32_N(m_NewBarFile, m_NumberSequences);
00093 
00094         // Columns
00095         int i = 0;
00096         WriteInt32_N(m_NewBarFile, m_NumberColumns);
00097         for (i=0; i<m_NumberColumns; i++)
00098                 WriteInt32_N(m_NewBarFile, (int)m_ColumnTypes[i]);
00099 
00100         // Parameters
00101         WriteInt32_N(m_NewBarFile, m_NumberParameters);
00102         for (i=0; i<m_NumberParameters; i++)
00103         {
00104                 WriteString_N(m_NewBarFile, m_Parameters[i].Tag);
00105                 WriteString_N(m_NewBarFile, m_Parameters[i].Value);
00106         }
00107 
00108         // Results
00109         for (i=0; i<m_NumberSequences; i++)
00110         {
00111                 WriteString_N(m_NewBarFile, m_Results[i].GetName());
00112                 WriteString_N(m_NewBarFile, m_Results[i].GetGroupName());
00113                 WriteString_N(m_NewBarFile, m_Results[i].GetVersion());
00114                 WriteInt32_N(m_NewBarFile, m_Results[i].GetNumberParameters());
00115                 for (int iParam=0; iParam<m_Results[i].GetNumberParameters(); iParam++)
00116                 {
00117                         WriteString_N(m_NewBarFile, m_Results[i].GetParameter(iParam).Tag);
00118                         WriteString_N(m_NewBarFile, m_Results[i].GetParameter(iParam).Value);
00119                 }
00120                 WriteInt32_N(m_NewBarFile, m_Results[i].GetNumberDataPoints());
00121                 BarSequenceResultData data;
00122                 for (int j=0; j<m_Results[i].GetNumberDataPoints(); j++)
00123                 {
00124                         for (int k=0; k<GetNumberColumns(); k++)
00125                         {
00126                                 m_Results[i].GetData(j,k,data);
00127                                 if (m_ColumnTypes[k] == BAR_DATA_INTEGER)
00128                                         WriteInt32_N(m_NewBarFile, data.iValue);
00129                                 else
00130                                         WriteFloat_N(m_NewBarFile, data.fValue);
00131                         }
00132                 }
00133         }
00134 
00135         // Save the footer
00136         WriteFixedString(m_NewBarFile, "END\n", 4);
00137 
00138         // Close the file
00139         m_NewBarFile.close();
00140 
00141         return !m_NewBarFile.fail();
00142 }
